headlong.translation[0].definitions[0].d: with your head first and the rest of your body following
headlong.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I fell headlong into a pool of icy water.
headlong.translation[0].definitions[1].d: very quickly, without looking where you are going
headlong.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Mortimer almost ran headlong into a patrol.
